name: select * from sockets.user_ip;
func:
msg.topic=
"select * from sockets.user_ip\
 join sockets.use_student_tools\
 on sockets.use_student_tools.studentID=sockets.user_ip.user_id\
 \
 join sockets.tools\
 on sockets.use_student_tools.toolID=sockets.tools.toolTypeID\
 \
 join sockets.identity\
 on   sockets.identity.id=sockets.user_ip.user_id\
 ;\
";
return msg;

func:

"select * from sockets.queue_student_tools\
 where\
 toolID="
+msg.toolTypeID
+"\
 order by datetime;";

name: select * from sockets.queue_student_tools where toolID order by datetime LIMIT 0,1;
func:
msg.topic=
"select * from sockets.queue_student_tools\
 join sockets.tools\
 on\
 sockets.queue_student_tools.toolID=sockets.tools.toolTypeID\
 where\
 toolID="
+msg.toolTypeID
+"\
 order by datetime\
 LIMIT 0,1;";
return msg;

name: select u_id,s_ip,s_id from u_ip join ip_id
func:
let user_id = msg.payload[0].studentID;
msg.topic=
"select sockets.identity.*,sockets.ip_id.ui_type,sockets.workplace.workPlace_tableColour,sockets.user_ip.user_id,INET_NTOA(sockets.ip_id.ipv4)as ipv4, sockets.ip_id.id as socketid from sockets.user_ip\
 join sockets.ip_id\
 on sockets.user_ip.ipv4 = sockets.ip_id.ipv4\
 \
 join sockets.workplace\
 on sockets.user_ip.workplace_ID=sockets.workplace.workPlaceID\
 \
 join sockets.identity\
 on sockets.identity.id=sockets.user_ip.user_id\
 where user_id="+user_id
return msg;

select * from identity where permission=1
func:
msg.topic=
"select * from sockets.identity\
 join sockets.user_ip on\
 sockets.identity.id=sockets.user_ip.user_id\
 \
 join sockets.ip_id on\
 sockets.user_ip.ipv4=sockets.ip_id.ipv4\
 where permission=1;";

return msg;

name: select * from identity join user_ip where ip
func:
msg.topic=
"select * from sockets.identity\
 join sockets.user_ip on\
 sockets.identity.id=sockets.user_ip.user_id\
 \
 join sockets.workplace\
 on sockets.user_ip.workplace_ID=sockets.workplace.workPlaceID\
 where ipv4=INET_ATON(\""+msg._client.socketIp+"\");";
return msg;

selectedJimpFunction.name: resize
selectedJimpFunction.description: resize the image. One of the w or h parameters can be set to automatic ("Jimp.AUTO" or -1).

parameters.name: w
parameters.hint: the width to resize the image to (or "Jimp.AUTO" or -1)

parameters.name: h
parameters.hint: the height to resize the image to (or "Jimp.AUTO" or -1)

parameters.name: options
parameters.hint: an object or an array of objects containing {"name" : "function_name", "parameters" : [x,y,z]}.  Refer to info on side panel}
